comments:
Build ID: 2.2M6

Steps To Reproduce:
1.In a library, create a scripted datasource.
2.in the library, create a scripted dataset that executes a pojo.
3. Add the Open and Fetch code to the dataset in the library.
4. use the dataset in a report

More information:
If I code the scripted dataset directly in my report it works.

The following is the out put from one test run with logging turned on:

Hi,
This is a bug when we saving data into report document. It will occur when column alias name and column name are same in dataset. I've fixed this bug when saving report document. 

Thanks
Mingxia
